original_title: People’s Bank felicitates two exceptional individuals
original_body_lines: People’s Bank recently felicitated two exceptional individuals who have recorded outstanding achievements. They were Samadhi Anuradha Ranawaka, a student at Mahamaya Girls’ College, Kandy, who secured the top position in the country in the 2022 GCE Ordinary Level Examination and Tharushi Karunarathna who won the Gold medal in the Women’s 800m event at the recently held 19th Asian Games.
People’s Bank Kandy Assistant Regional Manager Shameera Kumarapeli, Kandy Branch Senior Manager Prasanna Karunarathne and Kandy City Center Branch Manager Nashra Zuhair were present at the occasions.
